goals__remit: The Westmeath Local Community Development Committee (LCDC) is established pursuant to Section 36 (1) of the Local Government Reform Act 2014 for the purpose of developing, co-ordinating and implementing a coherent and integrated approach to local and community development in County Westmeath.
